casebody.data:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2010-1091. Barbee v. Allstate Ins. Co.

Lorain App. Nos. 09CA009594 and 09CA009596, 2010-Ohio-2016. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Lorain County.

Upon consideration of Allstate Insurance Company’s application for dismissal, it is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. The appeal of Nationwide Mutual Insurance Company remains pending.
